nlacp: If, in the Update a Schedule or Delete a Schedule sub-flows, the system is unable to retrieve the Student’s schedule, an error message is displayed.

truth.subject: none
truth.condition: in the update a schedule or delete a schedule subflows the system is unable to retrieve the students schedule

pred.subject: system
pred.condition: in the update a schedule or delete a schedule subflows the system is unable to retrieve the students schedule
